strategy: Introduce a time-dependent mixed strategy where the row player adjusts the probability of choosing Action A based on the current round number modulo 3. Specifically, in rounds where (round % 3) == 0, the player chooses Action A with probability 0.7; otherwise, they choose Action A with probability 0.3. This creates a cyclical pattern that may exploit the column player’s tendency to anticipate or pattern-match, thereby increasing coordination opportunities in predictable cycles.
